bites.bite: The largest adm_1 is Ceará state with 82 reports.
The largest adm_2 is Fortaleza municipality with 29 reports followed by Caucaia municipality with 12 reports.
The largest adm_1 is Rio de Janeiro state with 138 reports followed by Ceará state with 135 reports.
The largest adm_2 is Rio de Janeiro municipality with 136 reports followed by Fortaleza municipality with 62 reports.
